review: Doctor is very patient in hearing how we feel first which i feel is very important during any treatment. He has also diagnosed my problem accurately. With nominal fees it is difficult to find a good doctor now. I will highly recommend Dr. Hariharan for his sincerity.
Dr Hariharan always speaks about his experience which is not relevent.and can be much better in diagonosing diseases.

I am from Salem...  I'm showing my mom to him for  2 year the way he treat us very good . Very casual person...  He wont  give unwanted medicine ... They medicine which has been prescribed by him will wont give any side effects for my mom ... Hats off sir for ur dedicated work...
Whenever i speak with him about my problem. He gives correct solution for my problem. Always i like Dedicated doctor like Dr.Hariharan V.S.
